word_mean_info__list.difference: 除特殊情况外，侧重长距离。也可用作引申意义。
侧重指离中心地有利的地方很远。

word_group.brief_definition: 向远方眺望；遥远的前景

bilingual.source: In a distant country, there was a boy.
bilingual.target: 在一个遥远的国家，有一个男孩。
科学家发现了一个遥远的星系。

bilingual.source: So early one cold winter morning, she set out to a distant town.
bilingual.target: 所以在一个寒冷的冬天早晨，她出发前往一个遥远的小镇。

bilingual.source: And as the summer came to an end, Irniq and Samuel's friendship became a distant memory.
bilingual.target: 随着夏天的结束，伊尔尼克和塞缪尔的友谊成为了遥远的记忆。

bilingual.source: He was exiled to a distant island.
bilingual.target: 他被流放到一个遥远的岛屿。
这个岛屿是一个遥远的附庸。
望远镜放大了遥远的星星。

bilingual.source: The mission was to colonize the distant planet.
bilingual.target: 任务是殖民遥远的星球。

bilingual.source: The king was exiled to a distant island.
bilingual.target: 国王被流放到一个遥远的岛屿。

bilingual.source: The story originated in a distant land.
bilingual.target: 这个故事起始于一个遥远的国度。

yingyinNormal.en: But as a result of the destruction of Vulcan, your Starfleet began to aggressively search distant quadrants of space.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但在摧毁瓦肯星之后，你们的星际舰队开始大力搜索太空中遥远的象限。

yingyinNormal.en: So, what does all this have to do with time travel to the far, distant future? Well, the faster you go, the greater the effect of time dilation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么，这些和穿越时空和去遥远的未来有什么关系呢？当行驶的速度越快，时间膨胀的效应越大。

yingyinNormal.en: Galaxies are moving away from each other like raisins in a rising loaf of bread, which suggests that in the distant past, the universe must have been much smaller.
yingyinNormal.zh: 银河系正在互相分离，就像正发起面包里面的葡萄干，这表明在遥远的过去，宇宙一定是小得多。

yingyinNormal.en: We have the names and addresses of the families of every one of you, down to the distant cousins.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们有你们家人的名字和地址,包括不相干的堂兄弟姊妹，懂吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Wow. How am I going to play this? Sophisticated and relaxed? Friendly, noncommittal? Cold and distant?
yingyinNormal.zh: 嗯，我该怎么表现呢？优雅而自然的？还是友好而含糊的？或者冷淡且陌生的？

yingyinNormal.en: The balance of probability suggests that this is for an unmarried woman, distant from her close relatives.
yingyinNormal.zh: 权衡来讲这是为一名未婚与近亲疏远的女性准备的。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm really sorry I've been distant, but things will be better soon, I promise. Obviously starting tomorrow.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真的很抱歉，不能陪你，但我保证事情会好转的。很显然明天才会。

yingyinNormal.en: And I'll tell you, there were times in the not too distant past, where Francis and I, we almost lost our marriage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我还想告诉你们...就在不久之前，弗兰西斯和我...差点失去我们的婚姻。

yingyinNormal.en: Have you ever daydreamed about traveling through time, perhaps fast forward in the centuries and see the distant future?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你曾白日梦过穿越时空吗？或者穿越到几百年之后及看到遥远未来？

yingyinNormal.en: Because sometime in the not so distant future, you're gonna be pulling up to a red light in your beat up old Pinto, and that person's gonna be pulling up right alongside you in their brand new Porsche with their beautiful wife by their side, who's got big voluptuous tits.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为也许就在不远的将来，当你开着你的福特破平托在路口等红灯时，你发现在你旁边停下的是一辆崭新保时捷而车主就是现在你身边的人 他娇妻在侧双峰撩人。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: You can do activities such as golf and tennis or take a walk with others and still be socially <highlight>distant</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以做一些活动，比如高尔夫和网球，或者和其他人一起散步，但仍然保持社交距离。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>

examination_example.sentence: In Vicuna, <highlight>distant</highlight> (遥远的) star systems such as Magellanic Clouds can be seen without the help of an instrument.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在维库纳，不需要借助仪器就可以看到遥远的恒星系统，如麦哲伦星云。

examination_example.sentence: But when he could go to the <highlight>distant</highlight> place, he would find that life there is just as difficult.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是当他可以去那个遥远的地方时，他会发现那里的生活同样艰难。

examination_example.sentence: Receive <highlight>distant</highlight> radio messages from the universe.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 接收来自遥远的宇宙的无线电信息。
